column2: with a separate vegan menu! The vegan menu here has a great variety
column3: including everything from interesting brunch items to burgers to dinner entrees and drinks. I got the vegan crumpets
column4: which were fantastic. More along the lines of a beignet
column5: served with gooseberries and maple syrup. So flavorful and delicious. The hash browns were also excellent
column6: and a huge portion for the price.
